org.corfudb.runtime.object.transactions

Class AbstractTransactionalContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.runtime.object.transactions.AbstractTransactionalContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LambdaTransactionalContext, OptimisticTransactionalContext

    public abstract class AbstractTransactionalContext
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    Created by mwei on 4/4/16.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean inSyncMode
      Whether or not the tx is doing a first sync and therefore writes should not be redirected.
      CorfuRuntime runtime
      The runtime used to create this transaction.
      long startTime
      The start time of the context.
      TransactionStrategy strategy
      The transaction strategy to employ for this transaction.
      UUID transactionID

      • getObjectRead

        public abstract <T> T getObjectRead(CorfuSMRObjectProxy<T> proxy)
        Open an object for reading. The implementation will avoid creating a copy of the object if it has not already been done.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of object to get for reading.
        Parameters:
        proxy - The SMR Object proxy to get an object for reading.
        Returns:
        An object for reading.

      • getObjectWrite

        public abstract <T> T getObjectWrite(CorfuSMRObjectProxy<T> proxy)
        Open an object for writing. For opacity, the implementation will create a clone of the object.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of object to get for writing.
        Parameters:
        proxy - The SMR Object proxy to get an object for writing.
        Returns:
        An object for writing.

      • getObjectReadWrite

        public abstract <T> T getObjectReadWrite(CorfuSMRObjectProxy<T> proxy)
        Open an object for reading and writing. For opacity, the implementation will create a clone of the object.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of object to get for writing.
        Parameters:
        proxy - The SMR Object proxy to get an object for writing.
        Returns:
        An object for writing.
